title: Fail to connect, game not loading properly after reconecting.
body: This happens to me occasionally, after champ select it says failed to connect.  Upon retrying and finally loading into game the game does not run properly.  I cannot see items, skills, health bars don't change, no chat, gold amount doesn't increase, etc.  Pretty much the only thing I can see is champions moving.  Reconnecting repeatedly does not solve the problem.

replies.body: Hmmmmm that seems like a lot of visual errors pertaining to certain key aspects of the game which makes me feel like some of the game files are corrupted. Let's run a quick repair through the client options to make sure everything is still intact. Hit me back up after testing it in a practice game and let me know if you can see everything correctly again.
